mapper.update: UPDATE Profiles SET status = #{status}, login = #{login}, password = #{password} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT Profiles.id, Profiles.status, Profiles.login, Profiles.password FROM Profiles INNER JOIN Music ON Music.profile_id=Profiles.id WHERE Music.id = #{id}
